title: Secure Authentication and Access Control
summary: Implement secure login and multi-factor authentication with role-based access management.
description: Develop a robust authentication system using multi-factor authentication to protect user accounts. This epic includes implementing strong password policies, session handling, and secure token management. Integrate with identity management systems to support single sign-on (SSO) and build a role-based access control (RBAC) framework to ensure customers only access data and services aligned with their profiles. All authentication activities will be audited for compliance and transparency.

title: Responsive Portal Framework
summary: Design and develop a responsive self-service portal accessible across devices.
description: Establish a responsive, mobile-first self-service portal architecture ensuring consistent user experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. This will include building the front-end components using a scalable UI framework, implementing intuitive navigation, and ensuring accessibility compliance. The responsive framework will serve as the foundation for all future feature integrations.

title: Integration with Core Banking and Middleware Services
summary: Connect the self-service portal to the bankâ€™s core systems through APIs.
description: Develop and configure an API-based integration layer to facilitate connectivity between the self-service portal and the core banking system. This will include secure data exchanges for account, transaction, and customer information, with error management, encryption in transit, and proper logging. It ensures real-time data synchronization and reliable performance for all dependent functionalities.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Deliver a personalized dashboard displaying relevant services and products.
description: Develop a dynamic customer dashboard presenting personalized content such as account details, product recommendations, and eligible services based on user profiles and core banking data. The dashboard should offer customizable widgets, quick links, and visual indicators to help customers manage finances efficiently. Personalization logic will leverage integration with back-end systems for real-time insights and tailored service views.

title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Implement end-to-end digital workflows for account openings and modifications.
description: Create intuitive workflows that allow customers to open accounts, request modifications, or apply for services without visiting a branch. The workflows should be optimized for minimal input and clicks, with clear progress indicators. Users must be able to save incomplete applications as drafts, upload required documents, and resume their requests later. Automated eligibility checks and compliance validations should be integrated into each workflow.

title: Notification and Status Update Engine
summary: Enable real-time request tracking with in-app and email notifications.
description: Develop an event-driven notification engine that informs users about status changes for their submitted requests. Integrate email and in-portal notifications to provide real-time communication for approvals, pending actions, or rejections. The notification engine will be configurable and ensure messages conform to regulatory, security, and data privacy requirements.

title: User Interaction History and Audit Trail
summary: Maintain complete records of customer interactions within the portal.
description: Implement an activity tracking and logging system that captures all customer interactions, request submissions, document uploads, and correspondence. This history will be available to users for transparency and to administrators for audit and compliance reviews. The data will be securely stored, indexed, and easily retrievable while adhering to financial data retention regulations.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Establish a dedicated portal database ensuring performance and reliability.
description: Design and implement a local database architecture that optimizes portal operations and reduces dependency on the core banking system. It will utilize caching for frequently accessed data, synchronization mechanisms for real-time consistency, and high-availability configurations for fault tolerance. Database performance will be continuously monitored to ensure responsiveness and reliability under high transaction loads.

title: Security, Compliance, and Data Protection
summary: Ensure end-to-end security and compliance of all customer data and transactions.
description: Implement security controls, encryption, and monitoring solutions to protect sensitive financial data throughout the portal ecosystem. Conduct regular vulnerability assessments, compliance reviews, and data protection audits. Ensure adherence to regulatory frameworks like GDPR and region-specific banking security standards while maintaining customer trust and information safety.
